biography.bio: Erich Gonzales was born on September 20, 1990 in Cebu City, Philippines as Erika Chryselle Gonzales Gancayco. She is an actress, known for Maria la del Barrio (2011), Tanging yaman (2010) and Magkaribal (2010).
biography.name: Erich Gonzales

biography.bio: Derek Ramsay was born on December 7, 1979 as Derek Arthur Ramsay. He is an actor and writer, known for Magkaribal (2010), English Only, Please (2014) and Ang lalaking nagmahal sa akin (2009).
biography.name: Derek Ramsay

biography.bio: Mark Gil was born on September 25, 1961 in Manila, Philippines as Raphael Joseph De Mesa Eigenmann. He was an actor, known for Magkaribal (2010), Guns and Roses (2011) and Ikaw ay pag-ibig (2011). He was married to Maricar Jacinto-Eigenmann, Bing Pimentel, Irene Celebre and Jaclyn Jose. He died on September 1, 2014 in Manila.
biography.name: Mark Gil

biography.bio: Tetchie Agbayani was born on July 2, 1961 in the Philippines as Visitacion Parado. She is known for her work on Aryana (2012), Dahil sa pag-ibig (2012) and Affliction (2008).
biography.name: Tetchie Agbayani

biography.bio: Jeffrey Quizon was born on January 23, 1973 as Jeffrey Smith Quizon. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Oh, My Mama! (2016), Heneral Luna (2015) and Unlucky Plaza (2014).
biography.name: Jeffrey Quizon

biography.bio: Maria Isabel Lopez is an actress and producer, known for Kung ako'y iiwan mo (2012), Kinatay (2009) and Alyna (2010).
biography.name: Maria Isabel Lopez

biography.bio: Bodjie Pascua was born as Luisito Pascua. He is an actor, known for Paraiso (2012), L'éveil de Maximo Oliveros (2005) and Emir (2010).
biography.name: Bodjie Pascua

biography.bio: Mon Confiado is a Filipino Actor who has appeared in over 300 local films and more than 700 TV appearances and guestings since 1993. He won the Best Supporting Actor Award in the prestigious FAMAS (Filipino Academy of Movie Arts and Sciences) in 2008, equally regarded as the Academy Award of America in the film of National Artist for Film, director Eddie Romero, "Faces Of Love". He was also nominated in different Award Giving Bodies in the Philippines. He's also a Theater Actor who has done numerous stage plays in different theater groups. He portrayed the lead role in the longest running play "The Trial" of Dulaang U.P. (University of the Philippines [U.P.] Theater Group) in over 300 performances. He also did Federico Lorca's "The Blood Wedding" ("Bodas de Sangre") as the lead character, Leonardo. He also played the Main Character in other Plays like "Noli Me Tangere" (Touch Me Not), "No Exit", "Kanser", "Baclofen", "Kristo".. He co-worked with Isabelle Huppert (Award Winning French Actress, "The Piano Teacher") recently with Filipino Cannes' Best Director Brillante Mendoza's Film, "Captive". Confiado played an inmate in the film "Dance of the Steel Bars" (Post Production) about the You Tube sensation Cebu Dancing Inmates with Hollywood Actor Patrick Bergin (Julia Robert's "Sleepin' With The Enemy"). He got the Second Lead Role in the film "Behind Enemy Lines" with Thomas Ian Griffith ("Karate Kid", "Vampires"). David Hasselhoff ("Baywatch", "Knight Rider"), Rod Steiger ("In The Heat Of The Night", "Al Capone") and Mon Confiado were together in the film "Legacy". He was with Casper Van Dien ( "Starship Trooper", "Tarzan") in the movie "Going Back". In the film "Soldier Boyz", he co-worked with Michael Dudikoff ("American Ninja", "Tron"). Mon Confiado was born in Sampaloc, Manila Philippines. Stands 5 feet and 10 inches. The son of Veteran Filipino Character Actor, Angel Confiado. A graduate of Civil Engineering in Mapua Institute of Technology. An Entrepreneur, owner of several bars and restaurants in Manila and Cebu City most notably 22nd Street Comedy bar one of the pioneers of comedy bars in the Philippines. since 1997. He also co-owns Rock Street, ILoveSteak Steak House and Fab Body Spa, Salon and Nail Bar along with his siblings.
biography.name: Mon Confiado

biography.bio: Mosang is known for her work on Segunda mano (2011), Ded na si Lolo (2009) and Drumbeat (2007).
biography.name: Mosang

biography.bio: Sharlene San Pedro was born on April 15, 1998 in the Philippines as Sharlene Santos San Pedro. She is an actress, known for Luv U (2012), Wansapanataym (2010) and Maalaala mo kaya (1991).
biography.name: Sharlene San Pedro

biography.bio: Dan Alvaro is an actor, known for Bagong hari (1986), Serbis (2008) and Andrea, paano ba ang maging isang ina? (1990).
biography.name: Dan Alvaro

biography.bio: Ermie Concepcion is known for her work on The Bourne Legacy (2012), Brokedown Palace (1999) and Thelma (2011).
biography.name: Ermie Concepcion

biography.bio: Sue Prado is an actress and assistant director, known for Baby Factory (2011), Thelma (2011) and Mga dayo (2012).
biography.name: Sue Prado

biography.bio: Laiza Comia is an actress, known for Maalaala mo kaya (1991), Corazon: Ang unang aswang (2012) and White House (2010).
biography.name: Laiza Comia

biography.bio: Johnny Barnes is an actor, known for My Househusband: Ikaw na! (2011), Four Sisters and a Wedding (2013) and Cinco (2010).
biography.name: Johnny Barnes
